fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At day, you may accuse someone of treachery. They will be immediately executed without using up the day trial. (1 use.)
- At night, you may defend someone from wrongful prosecution, They cannot be voted for the rest of the following day.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You are considered a Devil or Demonic type role for any roles that interact with those types of roles.
- You may only ise your abilities on yourself once.
